duties_responsibilities.duty: Fulfill merchandising needs of grocery-related customers through stocking shelves and building/maintaining displays.
Order product for shelf and display to ensure in-stock conditions.
Maintain and represent leading brands through implementation of company guidelines.
Communicate with store managers and the Mondelēz management team.
Optimize visibility of products on shelves and construct promotional displays.
Enhance seasonal sales, seasonal displays, and new product launches.
Represent Mondelēz International with a professional and positive attitude.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED preferred
